import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { PorfolioService } from '../servicios/porfolio.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'] }) export class FooterComponent { constructor(private datosPorfolio:PorfolioService){} ngOnInit():void{ } }
